description: The job object for this EDI

isFriday.description: The setting to run this EDI job on Fridays

isMonday.description: The setting to run this EDI job on Mondays

isSaturday.description: The setting to run this EDI job on Saturdays

isSunday.description: The setting to run this EDI job on Sundays

isThursday.description: The setting to run this EDI job on Thursdays

isTuesday.description: The setting to run this EDI job on Tuesdays

isWednesday.description: The setting to run this EDI job on Wednesdays

time.description: The time (h:mm A) for this EDI job
